name: Football
description:
iMessage Football Game with Friends: Touchdown!**

Enjoy hours of fun as you outwit, outplay and out-mock, your friends. Block, tackle, dodge, and smack-talk your way to victory!

Be the Quarterback!
iMessage Football puts the strategy and fun of offensive and defensive play in your hands. Challenge your friends in a play-by-play contest of American Football!

- Smack Talk Bliss
Enjoy the two way smack-talk as you progress through a game towards touchdown. Make a play, gain ground, and make fun of your opponent. :-)
- Easy Controls
iMessage Football is simple and easy to learn, enabling you to quickly create your best defensive and offensive strategies.
- Fun Graphics
Using the best of what iMessage can offer you will enjoy the quick and fun graphics depicting each move opponents make.
